page.title: 13BRIAN'S TYPICAL DAY
page.content: I GET UP AT 7.00am BECAUSE MY BROTHER'S ALARM WAKES ME UP. IT IS BATTERY POWERED. I SWITCH MY TV ON AND I WATCH IT FOR 10 MINUTES. THEN I GET MY CLOTHES ON. I GO DOWN STAIRS AND HAVE BREAKFAST. I GO TO SCHOOL AT 8.45am AS I HAVE TO BE AT SCHOOL BY 8.55. WHEN WE GET INSIDE WE START OFF WITH TWO SONGS AND THREE PRAYERS ,THEN WE WORK.WE HAVE DINNER AT 12.00, THEN WE HAVE PLAY. WHEN IT IS DRY WE CAN PLAY ON THE FIELD OR THE PLAY GROUND. WHEN IT IS WET, WE STAY INSIDE AND READ COMICS AND PLAY CHESS. THERE ARE 3 CLASSES IN OUR SCHOOL, OF 37,36 AND 32 CHILDREN.THERE ARE 37 IN MY CLASS. IN THE AFTERNOON WE HAVE READING AND DO PROJECT WORK. SOMETIMES WE HAVE GAMES. AFTER SCHOOL I PLAY ON MY BIKE WITH MY BROTHER. I USUALLY GO TO BED AT 8.00pm.
